landing_content.t&c_1_desc: Our bet results are backed by VRF so you can trust that every spin and deal is completely fair and random.
landing_content.t&c_2_desc: 1% of all bets will be distributed back to ZeroHero holders. If you lose 15 consecutive bets of 50 SUI or more, we'll airdrop you a free random ZeroHero NFT.
landing_content.t&c_3_desc: We do not require user registration or funds to be deposited. Simply connect to the website and place bets straight from your wallet.
